query_templates.name: network_dynamics
query_templates.description: Network structure, topology, and dynamics in biological and social systems
query_templates.query: (abs:network OR abs:"network structure" OR abs:"network topology" OR abs:centrality) AND (cat:q-bio.* OR cat:physics.soc-ph OR cat:physics.bio-ph)
query_templates.rationale: Network keywords show highest discrimination (24.8%). Biology and social physics are high-mechanism-richness domains.

query_templates.name: optimization_control
query_templates.description: Optimization, control, and regulation mechanisms across domains
query_templates.query: (abs:optimization OR abs:optimize OR abs:optimal OR abs:control OR abs:regulation) AND (cat:q-bio.* OR cat:cs.AI OR cat:cs.LG OR cat:econ.*)
query_templates.rationale: Optimization has 24.6% discrimination. CS.AI, CS.LG, and economics focus on optimization problems.

query_templates.name: adaptive_evolutionary
query_templates.query: (abs:adaptation OR abs:adaptive OR abs:evolution OR abs:evolutionary OR abs:selection) AND (cat:q-bio.* OR cat:physics.bio-ph OR cat:cs.LG)
query_templates.rationale: Adaptation shows 23.7% discrimination. Evolutionary dynamics are rich in mechanisms.

query_templates.name: critical_phenomena
query_templates.description: Critical slowing, phase transitions, and bifurcations
query_templates.query: (abs:critical OR abs:criticality OR abs:bifurcation OR abs:"phase transition") AND (cat:nlin.CD OR cat:cond-mat.* OR cat:physics.soc-ph OR cat:q-bio.*)
query_templates.rationale: Criticality shows 19.4% discrimination. Nonlinear dynamics papers are mechanism-rich.

query_templates.name: feedback_homeostasis
query_templates.description: Feedback loops, homeostasis, and regulatory circuits
query_templates.query: (abs:feedback OR abs:homeostasis OR abs:regulation OR abs:regulatory) AND (cat:q-bio.* OR cat:physics.bio-ph)
query_templates.rationale: Feedback and regulation are core biological mechanisms. Q-bio is highest-richness domain (4.5/10 avg).

query_templates.name: coupling_synchronization
query_templates.description: Coupled systems, synchronization, and collective behavior
query_templates.query: (abs:coupling OR abs:coupled OR abs:synchronization OR abs:collective) AND (cat:nlin.* OR cat:physics.soc-ph OR cat:q-bio.*)
query_templates.rationale: Coupling dynamics are central to complex systems. Nonlinear dynamics domain is mechanism-rich.

query_templates.name: heterogeneity_diversity
query_templates.description: Heterogeneity, diversity, and variance effects on system dynamics
query_templates.query: (abs:heterogeneity OR abs:heterogeneous OR abs:diversity OR abs:variance) AND (cat:q-bio.* OR cat:physics.soc-ph OR cat:econ.*)
query_templates.rationale: Heterogeneity creates rich structural dynamics. Economics and biology study population diversity.

query_templates.name: cooperation_competition
query_templates.query: (abs:cooperation OR abs:competition OR abs:coexistence OR abs:"game theory") AND (cat:q-bio.* OR cat:econ.* OR cat:cs.GT)
query_templates.rationale: Game-theoretic dynamics generate rich mechanisms. Game theory and economics are natural targets.

usage_notes: Use arXiv API with these queries to fetch targeted papers
expected_hit_rate is based on keyword presence in high-value papers (≥7/10)
discrimination_power shows keyword effectiveness (high vs low value papers)
Target recent papers (2024-2025) for maximum relevance
Combine multiple queries to diversify mechanism types
